module.name: Call Event Logging
module.changelog: *15.0.15.12* FREEPBX-22064 CEl showing default user data in UCP *15.0.15.11* Packaging of ver 15.0.15.11 *15.0.15.10* Packaging of ver 15.0.15.10 *15.0.15.9* FREEI-1762 *15.0.15.8* FREEI-1356 *15.0.15.7* FREEI-1214 PBXact 15 QA - Call event logging *15.0.15.6* FREEI-1045 Latest "cel" module for FreePBX 15 shows tampered file *15.0.15.5* FREEPBX-20556 XSS in page.cel_view.php *15.0.15.4* Related to FREEPBX-20414: removed $jobid from runRestore() *15.0.15.3* Fixed FREEPBX-20444: removed $tmpfiledir from processLegacy() *15.0.15.2* FREEPBX-20216 *15.0.15* FREEPBX-20216 *15.0.14* FREEPBX-18676 Configuration File Link removed(http://freepbx.org/configuration_files) *15.0.13* FREEPBX-19882 *15.0.12* FREEPBX-19854 Fixing comparison operator for CDRUSEGMT *15.0.9* backup and restore *15.0.8* FREEPBX-18944 take control of cel_odbc.conf, move usegmttime into cel_odbc.con under cel context *15.0.7* Fixing FREEPBX-18783 Undefined index issue *15.0.6* FREEPBX-18632 *15.0.5* New Backup and Restore for 15 Legacy *15.0.4* Packaging of ver 15.0.4 *15.0.3* FREEPBX-16337 CDRDBHOST not following AMPDBHOST when empty *15.0.2* FREEPBX-15626 On clicking search button redirects to the home page. *15.0.1* Branch from 14.0.2.2
module.description: The Call Event Logging module allows you to see all inbound and outbound calls for your user and listen to any call recordings that are associated with that call.
